definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
point of a spear/edge of a tool/vanguard/forward (in sports team)

sentences.english: I'm still a bit of a behind-the-striker player when possible.
sentences.chinese: 如果有機會，我仍然會更接近前鋒身後的位置。

sentences.english: The blind thrust structural deltas were formed in thrust belts front.
sentences.chinese: 沖斷系的前鋒爲盲衝結構的構造三角帶。

sentences.english: From there, the Spain striker curled a shot into the top corner of the net.
sentences.chinese: 就在那裏，西班牙前鋒的一個弧線球直搗球網的上方。
唐戈朗是這方面的前鋒。

sentences.english: Portsmouth are in the frame for Olympique Lyon attacker Sidney Govou.
sentences.chinese: 朴茨茅斯正在追逐里昂前鋒戈武。

sentences.english: Dutch striker Quincy is starting to get more involved in the frist -team this season.
sentences.chinese: 荷蘭前鋒昆西在本季一隊比賽中取得的機會越來越多。

sentences.english: Manu is a good striker. We can’t carry six strikers.
sentences.chinese: 馬努是個好前鋒，但我們不能帶六個前鋒。

sentences.english: Manu is a good striker. We can’t carry six strikers.
sentences.chinese: 馬努是個好前鋒，但我們不能帶六個前鋒。

sentences.english: Real Mallorca striker Dani Guiza admits he fancies a move to Roma.
sentences.chinese: 馬洛卡前鋒古伊薩承認他夢想加盟羅馬。

sentences.english: Roma striker Shabani Nonda is in line for a move to Galatasaray.
sentences.chinese: 羅馬前鋒農達有意轉會至加拉塔薩雷。

sentences.english: Who's the best small forward of all time?
sentences.chinese: 誰又是NBA歷史上的最好的小前鋒呢？

sentences.english: Tottenham striker Jermain Defoe, and maybe Nugent, will be a good option to come off the bench if needed.
sentences.chinese: 熱刺前鋒迪福以及紐根特都將會是有實力的替補。

sentences.english: Stoke City break their transfer record to capture Sunderland striker Kenwyne Jones.
sentences.chinese: 斯托克破俱樂部轉會記錄地從桑得蘭簽下了前鋒瓊斯。

sentences.english: The decamping of the Portugal forward and playboy for Real Madrid has left a huge void.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄牙前鋒的突然離開留下了一個大缺口。

sentences.english: If the progress chart is in horizontal, is it apply to a bar chart?
sentences.chinese: 如果平放前鋒線，適用於橫道圖嗎？

sentences.english: OK, they run out in the front. Those are called forwards.
sentences.chinese: 就是跑在最前面的，那些人叫前鋒。

definition: middle period of a tripartite provincial exam (in former times)/midfield/mid-court (in sports)/half-time/intermission half-way through a performance
to heal a wound/to recuperate (from an injury)
